metadata.name: The Shvdows x Little Man!
metadata.description:
Have you ever wondered what Cayden does in the Shvdows? The answer to this very simple, yet very complicated question is a three word sentence! üëª

"He creates ART!" üñºÔ∏è

To celebrate the "in the not to distance future" launch of the epic "The Shvdows", Who artistic master mind behind the art for the The Shvdows have gotten together with little man to create a truly unique piece of 3D art! A truly one of a kind piece, abstract physical canvas meets jaw dropping 3D animation! üí•

All processed from this open edition will be going towards Cayden's education and therapies fund!  üåà
